name: It can only hurt
description:
Description

You are a lone survivore during a zombie apocalypse. Sadly for you, they seem to have find you and you'll surely die, but not without a fight.

Hopefully, you can upgrade your arsenal, but at what cost ?

How to play

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around and the mouse to look around. Hold the left button to fire.

This game is better played in fullscreen !

Have fun !
